verses.verse: Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> you <S%H4672>find;<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H4039>scroll,<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
So I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and He <S%H398>fed<s%> me <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H4039>scroll.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>feed<s%> your <S%H990>stomach,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H4578>body<s%> with <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H4039>scroll<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am <S%H5414>giving<s%> you." Then I <S%H398>ate<s%> it, and it was <S%H4966>sweet<s%> as <S%H1706>honey<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Then He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H935><s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> with My <S%H1697>words<s%> to them.

"For you are not being <S%H7971>sent<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H6012>unintelligible<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> or <S%H3515>difficult<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> [but] to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

<S%H3808>nor<s%> to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of <S%H6012>unintelligible<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> or <S%H3515>difficult<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> you <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H8085>understand.<s%> But I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to them who should <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you;

yet the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will not be <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to you, <S%H3588>since<s%> they are not <S%H14>willing<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to Me. <S%H3588>Surely<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2389>stubborn<s%> <S%H4696><s%> and <S%H7186>obstinate.<s%> <S%H3820><s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> as <S%H2389>hard<s%> as their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and your <S%H4696>forehead<s%> as <S%H2389>hard<s%> as their <S%H4696>foreheads.<s%>

"Like <S%H8068>emery<s%> <S%H2389>harder<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6864>flint<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H4696>forehead.<s%> Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them or be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H3588>though<s%> they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

Moreover, He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> into your <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you, and <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H241>closely.<s%>

"And <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H935><s%> to the <S%H1473>exiles,<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them and <S%H559>tell<s%> them, <S%H518>whether<s%> they <S%H8085>listen<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> not, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>'"

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up, and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rumbling<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> me, <S%H1288>"Blessed<s%> be the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in His <S%H4725>place.<s%>"

And I [heard] the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H9130>living<s%> <S%H9130>beings<s%> <S%H5401>touching<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another,<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> them, even a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rumbling<s%> <S%H6963>sound.<s%>

So the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up and <S%H3947>took<s%> me away; and I <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H4751>embittered<s%> in the <S%H2534>rage<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2389>strong<s%> on me.

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H413>beside<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar<s%> at Tel-abib, and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H8033>where<s%> they were <S%H3427>living,<s%> <S%H8074>causing<s%> <S%H8074>consternation<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.
Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1121>"Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> whenever you <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> from My <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H2094>warn<s%> them from Me.

"When I <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> 'You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>'; and you do not <S%H2094>warn<s%> him or <S%H1696>speak<s%> out to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> that he may <S%H2421>live,<s%> that <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H7563>man<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"Yet <S%H3588>if<s%> you have <S%H2094>warned<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he does not <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> or from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H5315>yourself.<s%>

"Again, when a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and I <S%H5414>place<s%> an <S%H4383>obstacle<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him, he shall <S%H4191>die;<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> you have not <S%H2094>warned<s%> him, he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H9128>sin,<s%> and his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> <S%H6666>deeds<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"However, <S%H3588>if<s%> you have <S%H2094>warned<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> should not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and he does not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H2094>took<s%> <S%H2094>warning;<s%> and you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H5315>yourself.<s%>"

And the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was on me <S%H8033>there,<s%> and He <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H6965>"Get<s%> up, <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H1237>plain,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you."

So I <S%H6965>got<s%> up and <S%H3318>went<s%> out to the <S%H1237>plain;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> like the <S%H9202>glory<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> then <S%H935>entered<s%> me and made me <S%H5975>stand<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with me and <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H935>"Go,<s%> <S%H5462>shut<s%> yourself up in your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"As for you, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> they will <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> on you and <S%H631>bind<s%> you with them, so that you <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

"Moreover, I will make your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to the <S%H2441>roof<s%> of your <S%H2441>mouth<s%> so that you will be <S%H481>dumb,<s%> and <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be a <S%H376>man<s%> who <S%H3198>rebukes<s%> them, for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

"But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you will <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God.<s%>' He who <S%H8085>hears,<s%> let him <S%H8085>hear;<s%> and he who <S%H2310>refuses,<s%> let him <S%H2308>refuse;<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
